analysis.career_trajectory: Started with Java in 2014, exploring various Android development projects and tools. Pivoted to Kotlin in 2022, focusing on Jetpack Compose and graphics programming. Recently worked on Filament, a real-time physically based rendering engine.

technical_obsessions.evidence: [2025-12-07] pathway: A set of APIs to manipulate graphics paths on Android.
[2025-11-29] shadow-pointer: Rendering high-quality shadow from the user's finger

comment_analytics.communication_style: Asks technical questions about graphics programming and rendering, provides detailed explanations of their own code.

match_profile.similar_user_traits: A developer who is passionate about graphics programming and real-time rendering.
conversation_starters: What are some challenges you faced while implementing Filament?
How do you optimize performance for complex graphics scenes?
Can you share your experience with Kotlin's graphics APIs?
